section.title: Testing a Web Service
section.para: A JAX-WS web service can be tested by using the Web Service Tester View displayed in . The JAX-WS test is specified by:

listitem.para: Selecting the JAX-WS combo box option.
Entering the location of the WDSL file.

section.para: Step can be performed in a number of ways including:

listitem.para: entering the location directly in the editable dropdown list; or
clicking the Get from WSDL file button and entering the URL, Eclipse workspace or File system details.
